name: Total Annihilation Kingdoms

files.installer: N/A:Select the Total Annihilation Kingdoms installer provided by GOG.

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Total Annihilation Kingdoms installer provided by GOG.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Total Annihilation Kingdoms/Kingdoms.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    name: wintricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
